title: Thanksgiving preview extravaganza
itunes:title: Thanksgiving preview extravaganza
description:
A room filled with heroes - Dan Hanzus, Gregg Rosenthal, Chris Wesseling, and Marc Sessler – discuss the latest news from around the NFL, including Browns quarterback Johnny Manziel being benched just one week after being named a starter, and Peyton Manning’s questionable future in Denver. Then, the heroes go game-by-game breaking down the 2015 Thanksgiving lineup before reading off some of their favorite iTunes comments from you, the listeners.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
